EntryName	NR1I3_HUMAN
ProteinName	Nuclear receptor subfamily 1 group I member 3 (Constitutive activator of retinoid response) (Constitutive active response) (Constitutive androstane receptor) (CAR) (Orphan nuclear receptor MB67)
GeneName	NR1I3 CAR
Length	306
Function	Binds and transactivates the retinoic acid response elements that control expression of the retinoic acid receptor beta 2 and alcohol dehydrogenase 3 genes. Transactivates both the phenobarbital responsive element module of the human CYP2B6 gene and the CYP3A4 xenobiotic response element.
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Cytoplasm; Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton
